product_name: Thule Pack 'n Pedal Small Adventure Touring Pannier - Single
long_description: Ideal for mounting on a front bike rack, the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Small Adventure Touring Pannier is a lightweight, durable and waterproof pannier for commutes and tours. Thule Pack 'n Pedal Small Adventure Touring Pannier features a waterproof, roll-top design to keep contents dry. Vanishing hardware system flips away when carried off the bike to provide maximum carrying comfort. Attachment system is easy to use, secure and vibration-free. Exterior translucent pockets allow safety light to be used and stored in one convenient location (light not included). Reflective strips increase visibility, and compression straps keep contents securely in place. Integrated grab handle and detachable messenger-style strap allow for multiple carrying options. Works best with Thule Pack 'n Pedal Tour Rack (sold separately), but works with virtually any rack.
short_description: Ideal for mounting on a front bike rack, the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Small Adventure Touring Pannier is a lightweight, durable and waterproof pannier for commutes and tours.
